name: Challah (Braided Egg Bread) — yields one large loaf
ingredients: 4 cups (500 g) all-purpose flour (plus extra for dusting)
1 packet (7 g / 2 1/4 tsp) active dry yeast
2 large eggs + 1 egg for egg wash
1/2–3/4 cup (120–180 ml) warm water (adjust for dough consistency)
Optional: sesame seeds or poppy seeds for topping
